channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Privilege Vault
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Privilege Vault

item.title: CVE-2021-29677|2024-08-03T22:11:06.247Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege%20vault
item.description: IBM Security Verify (IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault 10.9.66) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2021-29676|2024-08-03T22:11:06.284Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege%20vault
item.description: IBM Security Verify (IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault 10.9.66) is vulnerable to link injection. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URL link, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking

item.title: CVE-2021-20583|2024-08-03T17:45:44.537Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege%20vault
item.description: IBM Security Verify (IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault 10.9.66) could disclose sensitive information through an HTTP GET request by a privileged user due to improper input validation.. IBM X-Force ID: 199396.
